translations: v．打扮，修饰：花时间精心整理自己的外表。
· She primps in front of the mirror before going out.
她在出门前在镜子前打扮。

sentences.sentence: An in-situ test of large industrial water primps characteristics, which is a combination of thermodynamical method and motor shaft power measurement, is described in this paper.
sentences.translation: 将热力学方法与电工仪表测算电动机轴功率方法结合起来，可以较准确地测出一台工业用大型水泵的性能。
